SUBSTRUCTURE COPY(NEW TYPE, OLD TYPE).description: SUBSTRUCTURE COPY with parameter(s) NEW TYPE, OLD TYPE.

body: *SUBSTRUCTURE COPY, NEW TYPE=${1}, OLD TYPE=${2}, NEW LIBRARY=${3}, OLD LIBRARY=${4}
SUBSTRUCTURE COPY(NEW TYPE, OLD TYPE, NE.description: SUBSTRUCTURE COPY with parameter(s) NEW TYPE, OLD TYPE, NEW LIBRARY, OLD LIBRARY.
